## Weight vs. MPG

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
ggplot(data=mtcars, aes(wt, mpg))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_minimal()+
  geom_smooth()+
  labs(
    title = "The Effect of Weight on MPG",
    subtitle = "From mtcars",
    xlab("Weight"),
    ylab("MPG")
  )
```
